entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Multiselection for Collectionview doesn't works on MacCatalyst #18028
  • Maui.Windows - Grid does not confine contents to row #18026
  • .NET MAUI Blazor survey #18022
  • Right way to dispose page with WebView #18021

Closed

  • Entry field does not get unfocused when you click on another element in the view. This works in Xamarin #18000
  • The .NET MAUI base template project doesn't compile because resizetizer is not loading in the images from the csproj #14422
    Backlog
  • Wrong DisplayName and EnglishName in CultureInfo on iOS #14148
  • [Android] Image.Source = ImageSource.FromResource() & ImageSource.FromStream() are not reliably integrating back with the MainThread #17857

PullRequests

Merged

  • Enable more legacy tests #17931
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, .NET 8 SR1

Updated

  • Improves performance on BindableProperty #17756
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨, Under Consideration
  • Add remapping extensions for core #17918
    area/controls 🎮, control-image, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Android] Avoid issues creating a Borderless Entry with a custom Handler #17778
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, .NET 8 SR1
